com.flowpowered.caustic.api

Class GLImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.GLImplementation

  • public class GLImplementation
extends Object
    Represents and implementation of an OpenGL or OpenGLES version. Also manages the implementations statically.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GLImplementation(GLVersioned.GLVersion version, String contextName)
      Constructs a new implementation from the version and the context class name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Context get(GLImplementation glImplementation)
      Returns a Context for the GLImplementation, loading it if necessary.
      static Set<GLImplementation> getAvailableImplementations()
      Returns an unmodifiable set of all the available implementations.
      String getContextName()
      Returns the full name of the context class.
      GLVersioned.GLVersion getVersion()
      Returns the GLVersioned.GLVersion of this implementation.
      static boolean load(GLImplementation implementation)
      Loads the implementation, making it accessible.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • GLImplementation

        public GLImplementation(GLVersioned.GLVersion version,

        Constructs a new implementation from the version and the context class name.

        contextName - The context class name

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public GLVersioned.GLVersion getVersion()
        Returns the GLVersioned.GLVersion of this implementation.

        public String getContextName()
        Returns the full name of the context class.
        Returns:

      • load

        public static boolean load(GLImplementation implementation)
        Loads the implementation, making it accessible.
        Parameters:
        implementation - The implementation to load
        Returns:
        Whether or not the loading succeeded

      • get

        public static Context get(GLImplementation glImplementation)
        Returns a Context for the GLImplementation, loading it if necessary.
        Parameters:
        glImplementation - The GL implementation to look up a factory for
        Returns:
        The implementation, as a Context or null if it couldn't be loaded

      • getAvailableImplementations

        public static Set<GLImplementation> getAvailableImplementations()
        Returns an unmodifiable set of all the available implementations.
        Returns:
        The available implementations
